venue.address_1: W. Parish Rd. & Broad Cove Drive
venue.name: Mast Yard State Forest

item.description: Mast Yard State Forest is in both Concord and Hopkinton, NH. We will be exploring the hiking trails on the Concord side which will be a loop about 5 miles long and it will take about 2 hours. The terrain is relatively flat. Part of the trail is along an old railroad bed. There is a plowed parking lot at the starting point. The forest gets it's name as it used to be logged for masts for ships in the past. You can check out a website with a description and a map for the trails at [url=www.concordtrails]http://www.onconcord....
item.how_to_find_us: I have a white suzuki grand vitara with the license plate dog park

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Mast Yard State Forest Trails, Concord, NH
